title: Contract Negotiation
description: A potential enterprise customer is requesting changes to the standard Master Service Agreement (MSA), specifically regarding liability limits.

tasks.description: Receive the customer's requested redlines for the MSA.
tasks.expected_outcome: Account Executive understands the customer's legal concerns.

tasks.description: Consult the internal legal playbook for pre-approved fallback positions on liability.
tasks.expected_outcome: Account Executive finds an approved alternative clause.

tasks.description: If the request is outside standard fallbacks, escalate the redlines to the legal department for review and approval.
tasks.expected_outcome: Account Executive correctly escalates the non-standard request.
